SELECT t_school.schoolId, t_school.schoolName, major.majorCount majorCount, class.classCount classCount, student.studentCount studentCount FROM ( (SELECT t_school.schoolId schoolId, COUNT(t_major.majorId) majorCount FROM t_school LEFT JOIN t_major ON t_school.schoolId = t_major.majorSchoolId GROUP BY t_school.schoolId) AS major, (SELECT t_school.schoolId schoolId, COUNT(t_class.classId) classCount FROM t_school LEFT JOIN t_major ON t_school.schoolId = t_major.majorSchoolId LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_major.majorId = t_class.classMajorId GROUP BY t_school.schoolId) AS class, (SELECT t_school.schoolId schoolId, COUNT(t_student.studentNo) studentCount FROM t_school LEFT JOIN t_student ON t_student.studentSchoolId = t_school.schoolId GROUP BY t_school.schoolId) AS student ), t_school WHERE t_school.schoolId = major.schoolId AND t_school.schoolId = class.schoolId AND t_school.schoolId = student.schoolId
